name: tspUpdate
description:
Update information of the Telephony Service Provider set up on an account.
**Prerequisites**:
TSP account option should be enabled.
**Scopes:** `tsp:write:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`

dial_in_number_unrestricted.description: Control restriction on account users adding a TSP number outside of account's dial in numbers.

enable.description: Enable 3rd party audio conferencing for account users

master_account_setting_extended.description: For master account, extend its TSP setting to all sub accounts. For sub account, extend TSP setting from master account.

modify_credential_forbidden.description: Control restriction on account users being able to modify their TSP credentials.

tsp_enabled.description: Enable TSP feature for account. This has to be enabled to use any other tsp settings/features.
